name: 4. Warm Studio
description: Warm, creative design with Crimson Pro and Work Sans fonts
instructions: Create a warm, inviting aesthetic with elegant Crimson Pro headings and clean Work Sans body text. Use burnt orange (#D84315) for warmth and brown (#6D4C41) for grounding. Perfect for creative, human-centered content.

image_style.prompt: Create warm, inviting images with organic shapes and human-centered design. Use burnt orange (#D84315) and brown (#6D4C41) tones on a warm cream background (#FFF8F0). Style should feel approachable, creative, and elegant.
